result.value: The web frontend for the DataCite Commons discovery service.

result.description:
## What's Changed
* Disable Related Works CSV download by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/521


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.40.1...1.40.2

## What's Changed
* `use client` on WorkMetadata to avoid ref crashes in deployment by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/520


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.40.0...1.40.1

## What's Changed
* Adds info cards to homepage by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/519


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.39.0...1.40.0

## What's Changed
* Support embeddable related aggregate network graph by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/517


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.38.1...1.39.0

## What's Changed
* Upgrade nextjs 15 by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/507
* Add proxy for ROR to avoid CORS issues by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/514
* Use correct URL for downloading reports by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/513
* Remove display normalization of `ogl-canada` rightsIdentifiers to avoid display issues by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/511


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.38.0...1.38.1

## What's Changed
* redirect ORCID with lowercase letters to uppercase by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/504
* Rationalize claim error handling by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/506
* Add parentheses around organization query string so filters work correctly when building query string by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/508


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.37.0...1.38.0

## What's Changed
* Fix Vercel base URL logic for internal related works api calls by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/495
* Revert "Fix Vercel base URL logic for internal related works api calls" by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/496
* Discover works alert by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/498


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.36.0...1.37.0

## What's Changed
* Adds support for ROR identifiers when linking to a funder from a WorkFunding component on Work pages by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/494


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.35.0...1.36.0

## What's Changed
* Setup local frontend/backend dev by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/492
* Include funder identifiers in ROR records and RORs themselves in related content queries for organizations by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/493


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.34.1...1.35.0

## What's Changed
* Match ORCID as URL and ID by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/485
* Bump Next.js to 14.2.28 and update dependencies by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/487


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.34.0...1.34.1

## What's Changed
* Support ORCID IDs ending in X; link ORCIDs in Creators pane that aren't submitted as a full orcid.org link by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/486


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.33.0...1.34.0

## What's Changed
* Disable incremental search by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/484


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.32.0...1.33.0

## What's Changed
* upgrade nextjs to version 14.2.25 by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/482
* remove find related works button by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/483


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.30.1...1.32.0

## What's Changed
* migrate organization funders report to REST API by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/478
* add related works list to repository pages by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/480
* don't render related works if there is no client id by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/481


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.30.0...1.30.1

## What's Changed
* Fix: ORCID ID extraction and linking by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/477
* Repository page tweaks by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/475


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.29.9...1.30.0

## What's Changed
* Fix: Handle nullish subjects in extractFOS by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/476


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.29.8...1.29.9

## What's Changed
* Fix repository missing metrics by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/474


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.29.7...1.29.8

## What's Changed
* Migrate repository query to rest api by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/470
* Fix: Remove `cursor` parameter on facet selection by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/472
* add Unknown label to charts by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/473


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.26.9...1.29.7

## What's Changed
* Fetch and cache provider data from DataCite by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/469
* Updates to conform the People page to the styling and layout of Organization and Repository by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/467
* Fetch and linkify citations from DataCite API by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/468


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.25.0...1.26.9

## What's Changed
* refactored env vars into new constants file by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/462


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.24.0...1.25.0

## What's Changed
* Remove share panels by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/461
* Update pagination: rename DOI param, centralize cursor conversion by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/465
* Remove "More Info" section from `RepositoryDetail` by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/463
* Adds sort options to DOI search and validates sort parameter, default to relevance sort by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/466


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.23.0...1.24.0

## What's Changed
* Update About page with DataCite roadmap link by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/460
* ROR Organization Page with ROR REST API and Client-Side Data Fetching by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/458


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.22.0...1.23.0

## What's Changed
* migrate person query to REST api by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/447
* Customize scrollbar styles for better user experience and prevent layout shifts by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/457
* Fix: DOI query with quotes by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/459


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.21.0...1.22.0

## What's Changed
* `ServerButtons`: Use Next.js `Link` for navigation by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/456


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.20.0...1.21.0

## What's Changed
* Fix search functionality to prevent full page reload by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/455


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.19.0...1.20.0

## What's Changed
* Adds uniform horizontal spacing to facets list based on the container by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/451
* UI tweaks by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/452
* Refactor Facet List Components with Bootstrap Accordion by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/449


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.18.2...1.19.0

## What's Changed
* Add null check for repoId in RepositoryDashboard by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/453


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.18.1...1.18.2

## What's Changed
* Enhance DOI Search Error Handling by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/450


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.18.0...1.18.1

## What's Changed
* Migrate Organization Search to ROR V2 API Client by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/448


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.17.0...1.18.0

## What's Changed
* update search person query to use ORCID's REST API by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/446
* Add loading placeholder for search facets by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/445


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.16.2...1.17.0

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.16.1...1.16.2

## What's Changed
* use REST API for repository related content by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/438
* Add Conditional Caching for DOI Fetch Requests by @jrhoads in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/444

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.16.0...1.16.1

## What's Changed
* replace graphQL with REST API for organization related content by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/434
* Adds `Repository Type` facet based on `client.client_type` by @codycooperross in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/430
* move organization filtering into doi search logic by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/435
* add detail query parameter by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/439
* use license_with_missing instead of license facet by @bklaing2 in https://github.com/datacite/akita/pull/440


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/datacite/akita/compare/1.15.7...1.16.0

Renders doi pages that have a colon in the doi suffix

result.value:
You will need the following things properly installed on your computer.

* [Git](https://git-scm.com/)
* [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) (with NPM) - Suggestion is to use a version manager like [N](https://github.com/tj/n)
* [Yarn 1 Classic](https://classic.yarnpkg.com/lang/en/)

* `yarn build`
* `yarn start`
* Visit your app at [http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000).
The application is built and delpoyed using Vercel and GitHub Actions

* Fork the project
* Write tests for your new feature or a test that reproduces a bug
* Implement your feature or make a bug fix
* Do not mess with Rakefile, version or history
* Commit, push and make a pull request. Bonus points for topical branches.
